column4: if I have a computer at a remote location and there is a power failure which reboots the machine how can I log back in remotely and not enable insecure automatic login?
-> is sshd enabled so you can ssh into it?
I do have sshd installed but I was under the impression I can only use that one my user has already been logged in. I need the remote x session for my user to run.
-> nope, you dont need anyone to be logged in to ssh into it
